verses.text: Hear \w this|strong="H1121"\w*, all you peoples; listen, all inhabitants \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* world,
\w both|strong="H3605"\w* low \w and|strong="H5971"\w* high, rich \w and|strong="H5971"\w* poor alike.

\w My|strong="H1571"\w* mouth \w will|strong="H1571"\w* impart wisdom, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* meditation \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H1571"\w* heart \w will|strong="H1571"\w* bring understanding.

\w I|strong="H3820"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* incline \w my|strong="H1696"\w* ear \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* proverb; \w I|strong="H3820"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* express \w my|strong="H1696"\w* riddle \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* harp:
Why should I fear \w in|strong="H4912"\w* times \w of|strong="H4912"\w* trouble, when wicked usurpers surround me?

\w They|strong="H3117"\w* trust \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H3117"\w* wealth \w and|strong="H3117"\w* boast \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H3117"\w* \w great|strong="H7451"\w* riches.
No \w man|strong="H2428"\w* can possibly redeem \w his|strong="H5921"\w* brother \f + \fr 49:7 \ft Or redeem another\f* or pay \w his|strong="H5921"\w* ransom \w to|strong="H5921"\w* God.

\w For|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w redemption|strong="H6299"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* soul \w is|strong="H3808"\w* costly, \w and|strong="H3808"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w can|strong="H3808"\w* payment suffice,
\w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w he|strong="H5315"\w* should live on \w forever|strong="H5769"\w* \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w not|strong="H2308"\w* see decay.

\w For|strong="H2421"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w* \w is|strong="H3808"\w* clear \w that|strong="H7200"\w* wise men die, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* foolish \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* senseless \w both|strong="H2421"\w* perish \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w leave|strong="H2421"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* \w wealth|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* others.

\w Their|strong="H7200"\w* graves \f + \fr 49:11 \ft LXX, Syriac, and Aramaic Targum; Hebrew Their inward thoughts\f* \w are|strong="H2450"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* eternal homes— \w their|strong="H7200"\w* dwellings \w for|strong="H3588"\w* endless generations— \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* lands \w were|strong="H2428"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* namesakes.

\w But|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man, \w despite|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* wealth, cannot \w endure|strong="H5769"\w*; \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* beasts \w that|strong="H7121"\w* perish.

\w This|strong="H3885"\w* is \w the|strong="H3885"\w* fate of \w the|strong="H3885"\w* self-confident \f + \fr 49:13 \ft Or the way of the foolish\f* \w and|strong="H3366"\w* their followers who endorse their sayings. Selah

\w Like|strong="H1870"\w* sheep \w they|strong="H6310"\w* \w are|strong="H1870"\w* destined \w for|strong="H2088"\w* Sheol. Death \w will|strong="H2088"\w* \w be|strong="H1870"\w* \w their|strong="H1870"\w* shepherd. \w The|strong="H1870"\w* upright \w will|strong="H2088"\w* rule \w them|strong="H2088"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w morning|strong="H2088"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w their|strong="H1870"\w* form \w will|strong="H2088"\w* decay \w in|strong="H1870"\w* Sheol, far from \w their|strong="H1870"\w* lofty abode.

But God \w will|strong="H3477"\w* redeem \w my|strong="H7462"\w* life \w from|strong="H3477"\w* \w Sheol|strong="H7585"\w*, \w for|strong="H6629"\w* \w He|strong="H1242"\w* \w will|strong="H3477"\w* surely take me \w to|strong="H1242"\w* Himself. Selah

\w Do|strong="H3027"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* amazed \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* grows rich, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* splendor \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* house increases.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* dies, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* carry nothing away; \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w abundance|strong="H7235"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* follow \w him|strong="H7235"\w* \w down|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w Though|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w lifetime|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* blesses \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H3519"\w*— \w and|strong="H3381"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* prosper—

\w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* join \w the|strong="H3588"\w* generation \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w his|strong="H1288"\w* fathers, \w who|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* never see \w the|strong="H3588"\w* light \w of|strong="H5315"\w* day.

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H7200"\w* \w who|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H5331"\w* riches \w without|strong="H3808"\w* understanding \w is|strong="H1755"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* beasts \w that|strong="H7200"\w* perish.
